work.name: HashedIn By Deloitte
work.summary: I served as a key contributor in the development of a platform that allowed data scientists to create, test, develop, and deploy machine learning pipelines and models.
highlights: Worked on the big data features of the platform.
Integrated remote Apache Spark, with the jupyter notebooks on the platform. Thus, improving workflows for data scientists and reducing the time by about 20%.

work.name: HashedIn By Deloitte
work.summary: I contributed to the development and enhancement of a cutting-edge NLP platform that transformed the way our client managed their inventory.
highlights: Integrated the platform with the Azure Workspace platform.
Optimized model performance to increase efficiency by 5%.
Created and deployed models for new product lines, reducing client's workload by about 30%.

publications.name: Design of Robotic Hand And Wireless Glove to Tele-Operate
summary: We designed and developed a robotic hand that can be controlled using a specially designed glove wirelessly.

projects.name: Toxic Comment Classification
description: The aim was to classify statements as toxic or not without any bias across demographic subgroups.
We created a BiGRU model to achieve 92% accuracy over the dataset and 75% for the worst performing demographic subgroup.

projects.name: Name Entity Recognition for Legal Judgments
description: Name Entity Recognition for various entities (defendant, judge, advocate) in the Legal Judgments text files obtained from the Supreme Court of India.
This was achieved using a RNN and CRF.

projects.name: Tumour Detection in histopathologic scans of lymph node sections
description: We developed a deep learning model using CNN to classify and detect tumour in histopathologic scans of lymph node sections.
The model performed well and scored 0.88 f1 score for tumour detection.

projects.name: Market Basket Analysis of Grocery Shop
description: We did a comparative study of popular association rules algorithms Apriori, FP-Growth, and Eclat algorithms.
The Market Basket Analysis revealed valuable insights for the grocery and retail industry.
